about_the_game:
The only way to defeat the devils is seal them up!


The hero is an devil slayer who has been robbed of his weapons.
He has no direct means of attack, and the only way he can defeat the devils is lure them into the sacred boundary at top floor of village and seal them!

Put devils on the inclined railway, and transport them to the sacred boundary!


To transport the devils to the sacred boundary, use the inclined railway that through the center of the village. Load up arbitrary number of devils in the cargo bed of an incline railway and off you go! You must keep dodging enemy attacks until you reach the top floor of the village. The more devils you put on the cargo bed, the higher the risk, but the greater the return on a successful seal.

Seal the devils and earn the souls!


Once the cargo bed with the devils on it reaches the top floor, seal them up and round them up! If you seal them up, you can earn a lot of the "souls" they have accumulated.
The amount of souls you can earn depends on the number and color of the devils you sealed at that time.

There are plenty of exploration elements that allow you to fully enjoy the retro world!


The souls earned are needed, to restore the villager whose soul has been drained to sanity.
By helping them, you will expand the scope of your activities in the village.
Let's fully explore the romantic Japanese world of the late Meiji era!

You can also enjoy Co-op Battle!


This work has a mode selection function.
In addition to the regular Adventure Mode, you can also enjoy Co-op Mode for two players to play at the same time! You can play slowly and carefully by yourself, or you can have a lot of fun with two other people!

Feature:

  • Unique game mechanics consisting of elements such as battle using inclined railway, a hero who cannot attack, and risks that can be adjusted at any time.
  • A battle system has depth that can be enjoyed by a wide range of players, from beginners to experts.
  • A straightforward game nature where you can experience the joy of improving through repeated challenges.
  • A rich exploration element that allow visitors to fully enjoy the retro-romantic world of Japan in the late Meiji era.
  • The mode selection function allows enjoyment by one or two players.

name: Incline ～Railway of devil's valley～

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6300HQ CPU 2.3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950M / Screen resolution 1920×1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: An action adventure with a quirky battle system that uses an inclined railway to carry and seal devils to a sacred boundary. Robbed of his weapons, the unarmed hero must keep dodging devil attacks in the cargo bed of an inclined railway until he reaches the sacred boundary at top floor of village!
